author: Jay Peters
title: Thousands of Zoom recordings exposed because of the way Zoom names recordings
description: Thousands of Zoom recordings have been exposed on the web, according to a report by The Washington Post. The recordings are apparently named in an identical way, which makes them possible to find through a search.
content:
Its unclear if Zoom will change how it names the videos
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge
Thousands of Zoom cloud recordings have been exposed on the web because of the way Zoom names its recordings, according to a report by The Washington Post. The r… [+1974 chars]
